name: Knight of Hope Demo
description:
Chaos and despair corrupts this world. The wilder of Hope must fight endless waves of enemies to stop Chaos. YOU must wild Hope and save this world!

Fight endless waves of enemies (Beta)! Explore dungeons (WIP)! Traverse levels and slay the Ruler of Chaos (WIP)!

Controls: A & D to move, Space to jump, K to swing sword, L to shot left or right, W to shot up, W+L to shot diagonally, S to fall down.

Demo may contain glitches and bugs. Bose's AI will me improved in the future!
Pleas comment or send your problems, improvements and advice to me.
